data.text:
The USA Network app is the best place to catch up on the most recent season of your favorite shows, watch live TV, and stream movies and past season content! Download the USA app now to watch full episodes of Chrisley Knows Best, WWE Raw, Temptation Island, Miz & Mrs. AND MANY MORE!

Get started by signing in with your TV subscription (cable, satellite or digital). The USA app supports most TV providers, including DirecTV, Spectrum, Xfinity, Dish, and AT&T.

Sign up for an NBCUniversal profile within the app using your Google, Apple ID, or email account to sync your favorite shows across our family of apps and to continue watching progress across all your devices. Youâll also receive three credits to watch episodes for free before signing in with your TV provider.

APP FEATURES:

Watch Your Way

â¢ Watch the latest episodes of new USA Network shows the day after they air on TV.

â¢ Live stream and schedule available 24/7 when signed in with your TV provider.

â¢ Chromecast and AirPlay compatible! Start episodes in the app and stream to your TV.

â¢ Can't finish an episode in one sitting? The app saves your place so that you can resume watching later!

â¢ Mark shows as your Favorites for quick access to the latest episodes.

Explore NBCUniversal Content

â¢ Access to on demand content from across the NBCUniversal family of networks (including NBC, SYFY, Bravo, E!, Oxygen, MSNBC, CNBC, Universal Kids, Telemundo, and Universo).

â¢ Live stream your favorite NBCUniversal networks within the app.

â¢ Dedicated page for each network showcasing the hottest series.

â¢ Catalog of recent and throwback favorites available to watch.

â¢ Filter shows by network and genre while browsing.

TV Provider Access

Sign in with your TV subscription to gain access to the entire catalog of VOD & Live content.

NBCUniversal Profile

â¢ Create an NBCUniversal Profile to favorite and save shows across all your devices.

â¢ Resume watching your favorite shows where you left off on any device.

â¢ Receive three credits to unlock episodes for FREE!

COMMENTS OR QUESTIONS?

Please reach out to support@nbctve.zendesk.com for assistance.

Please note: Use of the app is limited to the United States and its territories. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE and Wi-Fi networks. Data charges may apply.

Privacy Policy: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy?brandA=USA_Network&intake=USA_Network

Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=USA_Network&intake=USA_Network

CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=USA_Network

This app features Nielsen proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsenâs TV Ratings.

To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

A. Nonauh Muss ,

Terrible app, good shows

Edit: I am struggling with the app even more than before. This is a terrible app and needs to be fixed. It is constantly buffering, wonât let me watch a full show without me having to reboot everything (app, phone, Chromecast, internet...) just to watch an entire show from start to finish. I took a star away because of the constant frustration that just keeps getting worse. Donât download unless you enjoy being frustrated.

This is not a good app. It freezes regularly in the middle of a show and I have to stop casting and then recast it and find my place in the episode of the show Iâm watching. In order to get back to where I was, I have to sit through more commercials. I have to restart the app often and Iâve had to reboot my phone a few times just to make it work. There is no other connectivity issue with any other apps and devices I use when USA is acting up. I have found that the NBC apps are all pretty much the same way. Theyâre pretty terrible, although so far, USA doesnât seem to be as bad as the NBC app. So yeah, unless you are really into a show on USA (like me) then itâs not really worth it.

L0streaper ,

NBC Universal lies to customers!!!

So wasnât able to be home to watch a show I like to watch that is on same time every week without fail but downloaded this stupid USA Network app to watch and the live stream isnât live at all not one but the show I wanted to watch started at 6pm and is 3 hours long and then went to watch on the app and the show was going live on my cable box ( had my fiancÃ© look to see if it was on live on the cable box and it was ) but the USA Network app said it didnât start till the show ends on cableâ¦.. how is that live tv!?!?!? Itâs not one bit so I will be contacting the company of the show I watch to let them know why I wonât be watching one of their shows anymore because I donât want anything to do with NBC Universal at all. Thankfully Fox network has another night that I will now watch instead of both. And it may seem a little weird that I say I will let the company know Iâm one that is on a council for the product which I have ways to contact so hopefully NBC Universal looses the contract and the go to a much more reliable source than NBC UNIVERSAL
